content.content: Posted by the authors already:     EIP-1167 - minimal proxy contract - moving to LAST CALL EIPs       Greetings Wizards!  We have been working EIP-1167 (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-1167.md) through the process.  To date we have had few comments directly, but we do have several users of this code in production.   While not ground breaking, we believe a standard for this will allow third party tools to provide better user experience for contracts that implement hard-wired proxies.
